name: think-bayes
description: An algorithm framework of probability and statistics for browser and Node.js environment.

scripts.build:index: npx rimraf esm/index.js && npx create-index --ignoreUnsafe esm
scripts.build:module: npx rimraf cjs && npx babel esm --copy-files --source-maps --extensions .js --out-dir cjs
scripts.build: npm run build:index && npm run build:module && npm run build:readme
